title: 我遇到了一个难题，大家进贴看详情。。。
author: geludan
txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=9131&page=1#pid99568
关键是这里，如何向外国朋友解释葛平，他肯定从小没看到过蓝猫，还要和他解释和吴克之间的关系，很麻烦啊
我试试：
葛平 is a dubber for "blue cat", a cartoon character in “蓝猫淘气三千问（囧）”, and once he went and performed in 石家庄 in 2002, there was an little boy without hair,just a kind of hair style, (not bald naturally!) He told 葛平 he really adores blue cat, then  葛平said：我是超威蓝猫！（i am super blue cat!) 吴克（the name of the boy)learnt and said it again,葛平 thought he learnt well.
That sounds great but afterwards he(葛平) has been 恶搞(who tells me how to translate exactly....),they said 大光头葛炮, 炮 means 撸炮, which is masturbation in english. So now when we mention 葛平, we are somentimes probably related to 大光头.....
That's it....
PS:吴克 that time was five, now is 15............囧
大家再想想，怎么和外国人解释葛平。。。。

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
那人有的英语都是不对的 所以他不一定是国外的人 或许是其他国家的人 只是英语不怎么好罢了

Geping was screwed due to his performance in <蓝猫淘气3000问> which is a chinese encyclopaedia cartoon  就这么简单

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-9-6 10:57 
那人有的英语都是不对的 所以他不一定是国外的人 或许是其他国家的人 只是英语不怎么好罢了

Geping was  ...
要说清楚点，比如说光头和葛炮。另外国外不就是其他国家的人，不一定是美国人或英国人，关键是中文不好。。。

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-9-6 11:15 
Bareheaded Gepao is Geping's nickname
应该建议他看看葛炮视频，这个主题不可以严肃
外加百度贴吧泡泡表情第五行第一个，懂的

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 就是啊 或者维基百科+谷歌翻译

replies.author: nic148
replies.txt_content: 用维基百科去,然後他自己會翻譯吧
